policy:
Privacy Policy

1. Data Controller

The personal data collected on the Site is processed by WebDev, represented by Léo Baccialone as the data controller, who can be contacted at contact@gusto-manager.com.

2. Data Collected

The data collected includes:

  • Restaurant owner contact details (name, first name, email, phone number) to enable identification and account management on the platform.
  • Information about the restaurants: menu, offerings, opening hours, and various establishment information.

3. Purpose of Data Processing

The data is collected and processed for the following purposes:

  • Management and access to the owner account on the platform.
  • Updating the information displayed on the restaurant’s website.
  • Monitoring and managing general information related to the establishments.

4. Data Retention Period

Personal data is retained for the duration of the contractual relationship with the restaurant. Once the relationship ends, the data will be archived or deleted in accordance with legal obligations.

5. User Rights

In accordance with data protection legislation, restaurant owners have the following rights:

  • Right of access: to know the personal data held about them.
  • Right to rectification: to correct any inaccurate or incomplete information.
  • Right to erasure: to request the deletion of their personal data.
  • Right to object and restrict processing: to oppose or restrict the processing of their data.
To exercise these rights, users can contact contact@gusto-manager.com.

6. Absence of Cookies

The Site does not use any cookies for user tracking.

7. Data Security

WebDev is committed to protecting the confidentiality of restaurant owners' data by implementing necessary security measures to prevent unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure.

8. Changes to the Privacy Policy

WebDev reserves the right to modify this privacy policy at any time to comply with legal and regulatory developments. The update date will be displayed at the top of the document in case of changes.

9. Contact

For any questions regarding the privacy policy, users can contact us at: contact@gusto-manager.com.
